oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Owen Bradley Orchestra - Hillwood Country Club - 1964-12-dd. Disc one side one
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Vinyl album recorded and created by Owen Bradley of the Owen Bradley orchestra recorded at the Hillwood Country Club in Nashville, Tennessee on December 1964. Disc 1 of 3. Side 1 of 2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: The Owen Bradley Orchestra; Owen Bradley - leader and piano; Dottie Dillard - vocalist; Gene Mullins - trombone; Bob Johnstone - vocalilst; Buddy Hall - vocalist; Don Sheffield - trumpet; Bob Moore - bass; Don Cassell - saxophone; Beverly LeCroy - trombone;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:32) All Of Me (male vocalist) / (04:22) Impossible (arrangement by Cam Mullins - trombone solo by Bev Lecroy) / (07:43) Yellow Summer (Dottie Dillard - vocalist / arrangement by Gene Mullins) / (11:49) I Can't Stop Loving You (arrangement by Gene Mullins) / (15:55) When I Fall In Love (Male vocalist) / ()19:50) FILE END.
